channel.title: CyberNetSec - Supply Chain Attack
channel.description: Latest supply chain attack threat intelligence - the last 10 articles

item.title: Massive NPM Supply Chain Attack Spreads Self-Replicating "Shai-Hulud" Worm
item.description:
A significant, ongoing supply chain attack is targeting the NPM JavaScript ecosystem, where a self-replicating worm dubbed "Shai-Hulud" has infected over 400 software packages. The attack has a substantial impact on the cryptocurrency sector, compromising at least 10 widely used libraries crucial fo...

Severity: Critical

Categories: Supply Chain Attack, Malware, Cloud Security

Read Full Article →

item.title: Supply Chain Breaches Escalate Despite Maturing Defenses, Report Finds
item.description:
A new 2025 report from cybersecurity firm BlueVoyant reveals a troubling trend: despite most organizations maturing their third-party risk management (TPRM) programs, the number of supply chain breaches is escalating. The study found that 97% of surveyed organizations experienced a supplier-related ...

Severity: Informational

Categories: Security Operations, Policy and Compliance, Supply Chain Attack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Italian IT Firm Almaviva Hit by Cyberattack, 2.3TB of Data Leaked
item.description:
The prominent Italian IT services provider Almaviva has confirmed it was hit by a major cyberattack, resulting in the theft and leaking of nearly 2.3 terabytes of sensitive data. The breach has exposed information from several of Almaviva's clients, most notably Italy's national railway operator, Fe...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Cyberattack, Supply Chain Attack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Chinese APT24 Group Uses 'BadAudio' Malware in Years-Long Espionage Campaign Targeting Taiwan
item.description:
The Chinese-nexus threat group APT24, also known as Pitty Tiger, is behind a nearly three-year cyberespionage campaign utilizing a new custom malware called 'BadAudio'. According to Google's Threat Intelligence Group, the campaign, active since November 2022, has targeted organizations primarily in ...

Severity: High

Categories: Threat Actor, Malware, Supply Chain Attack

item.title: Major Wall Street Banks Exposed After Breach at Mortgage Vendor SitusAMC
item.description:
SitusAMC, a critical technology and services provider for the real estate finance industry, has disclosed a significant data breach discovered on November 12, 2025. The cyberattack compromised corporate information and, more critically, data belonging to its clients' customers, which could include s...

item.title: ShinyHunters Hits Salesforce Again, Breaching Customers via Gainsight App
item.description:
Salesforce has disclosed a significant data breach affecting its customers, stemming from a compromised connection with the Gainsight customer success application. The notorious cybercrime group ShinyHunters, also tracked as UNC6240, has claimed responsibility for the attack, stating they exploited ...

Severity: High

item.title: Supply Chain Attacks & AI-Powered Phishing Surge Across Asia-Pacific, Darktrace Warns
item.description:
A new threat report from cybersecurity firm Darktrace highlights a dramatic increase in sophisticated cyber threats across the Asia-Pacific and Japan (APJ) region. The report, covering the 12 months to July 2025, details a surge in supply chain attacks, business email compromise, and cloud intrusion...

Severity: Informational

Categories: Threat Intelligence, Supply Chain Attack, Phishing

item.title: China-Aligned APT 'PlushDaemon' Wields 'EdgeStepper' Implant for Network Hijacking
item.description:
Security researchers have uncovered a new, sophisticated network implant named 'EdgeStepper' used by the China-aligned APT group PlushDaemon. The implant provides the attackers with adversary-in-the-middle (AitM) capabilities, allowing them to intercept and hijack legitimate software updates within ...

Severity: High

Categories: Threat Actor, Malware, Supply Chain Attack

item.title: Vendor Breach Exposes Patient Data at Innovative Physical Therapy
item.description:
Innovative Physical Therapy has notified patients of a data breach that originated from a third-party vendor responsible for practice management. The breach occurred when two vendor employees fell victim to phishing emails, leading to the compromise of their email accounts. Between June 25 and June ...

Severity: Medium

Categories: Data Breach, Supply Chain Attack, Phishing

item.title: Merck Employee Data Breached in Third-Party Vendor Incident
item.description:
Pharmaceutical giant Merck has confirmed a data breach impacting its current and former employees due to a cybersecurity incident at a third-party service provider, Graebel Companies. The breach, which occurred in September 2025, was disclosed on November 17. Exposed data includes sensitive PII such...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Supply Chain Attack
